column4: I'm using Gutsy and tried to test flash player by going to youtube. firefox reported i needed to install either flash player or gnash. i installed flash player - still wasn't working. i installed gnash aswell, still not working. Any ideas?
the ubuntu flash package is currently broke
where is it trying to write, and exactly what file/location ?
../txt/area.tst: Permission denied is what it says in the log. its /home/etrials/Rom24/area/area.tst
please show me the permissions on the file
How do i find it out?
ls -la /home/etrials/Rom24/area/area.tst
-rw-rw-r--  1 etrials etread 2348 Jan 31 00:42 area.tst
what is the user launching the mud process ?
enigma
then you need to either make enigma the owner of that file - or you need to chmod it to be world writeable
it's not stable
just a repo on the cd
on the dvd sorry
its actually very efficient for me, I've been monitoring it for the past 1.5 hours while I've been on a train
i'm noticing 50-200meg jumps in memory consumption over a 24 hour period. over short amounts of time i don't noticemuch change
that's still a reasonable change, I didn'tsee anything
w works of uid
you have created a user sharing the same uid as root - that's your issue
yea :( how can i now remove it?
you'll have to use the gui, or manually remove it from the password and shadow file
jeez, that message might have been helpful before i'd actually tried it :) luckily it failed
no
